name: randle michael
text: Atmosphere was chill I had to use the bathroom because I made a volcano mountain of nachos at a commercial shoot I was doing and well let's just say... It was erupting...and they let me use there facilities and didn't even try to make me …More

name: Roxolana Sklepova
text: Best pizza EVER!!! So fresh and delicious! We enjoyed it so much. For fellow avocado addicts I'd like to add- yummy guac too! I read a few reviews where people were complaining about portion size which made me laugh out loud. We left stuffed! We will definitely be back!

name: Larry Martin
text: Staff just stood around near our table and talked.   Way too pricey for the quality and parking is difficult to find.  Will not be going back.

name: Paul J Przepiorka
text: Very nice place, with lots of room to sit either at the bar area or their nice and clean tables. Staff is super nice and productive; however they don't deliver.

name: Susan
text: Great food great service always clean.  Nice place to go.

name: Christopher Johnston
text: Sadly, tonight is the last night they are open. After 16 years at this location, CPK is not renewing their lease.  We enjoyed our last meal there. It will seem strange not to see the California Pizza Kitchen sign on the building any longer.

name: Joselyn Trevino
text: Been here twice and the food has always been delicious no matter what I get. Staff if friendly and courteous. Their apple caramel dessert is amazing, highly recommend trying it!

name: Stanislav Petrenko
text: Love this pizza! Size aren’t big, but taste is great. 4 stars for servers. Some days are amazing service, some days you waiting too long to make an order. (Once was sitting over 20 min until they stop by us to take a order)

name: Christine Hecht
text: We always sit at the bar, so often the staff knows us. Everybody is always cheerful and say hi. The food is great and if your not sure what to get they will help suggest or help change something to your liking.

name: Tim Arnold
text: Excellent salads and pizza. Indoor booths and outdoor seating. Friendly staff. Great place to hang out with friends. We felt rushed by the staff. We were halfway done eating and they already dropped off the check and asked to box our meal.

name: Mustak Alam
text: First time at a California Pizza Kitchen and I was not impressed by the service or restaurant.  I sat at the counter and noticed there were a bunch of bar items sitting in front of me that the waiter did not even remove as he brought me my …More

name: Michael Bogan
text: I would recommend this restaurant. We eat at California pizza Kitchen often but this was our first chance to visit this location. The parking is a little inconvenient as the restaurant doesn’t have its own parking lot and its located in a …More

name: Jeff Shaffer
text: Lots of healthy choices on the menu that taste great. Service was prompt and friendly. The atmosphere at this location was very comfortable and the outdoor patio was very nice too.

name: Jim Petykowski
text: First time at a California Pizza Kitchen and I was not impressed by the service or restaurant.  I sat at the counter and noticed there were a bunch of bar items sitting in front of me that the waiter did not even remove as he brought me my …More

name: Arlene Gibson
text: First time ordering a cauliflower crust pizza.  Good but a little too crisp for me.  Will still give it a second try!

name: Ralph Rousseau
text: Okay so I had a great experience at the Skokie location and I wrote a great review about it but this one not so much you know the people over there were very kind and polite I ordered the Waldorf salad again but it wasn't the same it was …More

name: JKP16
text: I've had very nice staff and good food. I would recommended

name: Dan Hawker
text: It was terrible, hard, overcooked pizza, u get better pizza from little Caesar's or frozen section @ walmart, not worth $$$ save it go somewhere else

name: Sakina Dossaji
text: We had an outstanding dining experience at CPK with our server, Jeff. He was incredibly attentive, warm, and professional. We were already CPK fans, but Jeff took it to the next level. He went out of his way to make sure our experience was …More

name: Carter Powers
text: I came here many times. Good options, service and ambiance. Would recommend

name: Bill Geis
text: Service was good. However the portion sizes keep shrinking. Not worth the cost, there are many better  values near by. Won't be make this mistake again.

name: Steve Vaughan
text: Amazing selection of pizzas and salads. Despite it being a chain, the staff works hard at making it a unique experience. …More

name: Gary GaryT
text: The menu is excellent with good variety and selections of healthy foods.  The recent addition to the lunch menu where you can pick two choices from soup, pizza, and salad gives excellent value and variety over single choice items.  The only …More

name: Margaret Thron
text: Was there last Tuesday after noon with my daughter and her 2 children.one 5 yrs. Other 4 months.We ate outside on patio.Had a male waiter and he was very nice but we had to ask for everything that would normally be put on the table.He did …More

name: Traces of Heaven-GiftBandit
text: Always an excellent place to dine. They now have cauliflower  pizza crusts that you can turn any CPK pizza in to gluten free!!

name: Noah Miller
text: Great venue, food, and drinks. Definitely give it a try.

name: Yarkel
text: I just want to take  a moment and share with all of you who reads these reviews before going to dine out because this place California Pizza Kitchen is outstanding place. Let me tell you what happened on Saturday March 31 2018. I went with …More

name: Arthur Wright
text:
Despite the name of the restuarant it is not in fact in California. This location is in the middle of Arlington Heights Il, kind of misleading.
The food was good though, get the shrimp scampi pizza its tastey.

name: ethan bleasdale
text: Good food, long wait for food to arrive though

name: Maureen Drews
text: Menu includes gluten free pizza and waitstaff very careful to avoid cross contamination when serving.

name: Joe Roznai
text: Good food, decent prices. Special needs not a problem. They even have a GF menu of options. Friendly and courteous staff. Prompt service.

name: Christopher Channer
text: Good selections, good food, good service.  Lots of families with children.  Wine very overpriced.

name: 1 Bun
text: Fish tacos that will rival any taco/Spanish/Tex-Mex place. Wine selection for a chain restaurant is decent, but, wait - keep an eye on those prices.

name: G. LakeCounty
text: Good tasting food, family friendly, fair prices

name: T Murray
text: First time ever going to California Pizza kitchen and I think I'll stick to Chicago Pizza. Nothing wrong with the place staff was friendly enough just not my kind of pizza.

name: Vib Mehrotra
text: Good food and service.

name: Kirk Porter
text: Our waitress was amazing, great personality and very friendly.

name: John Sluga
text: The staff is friendly. The food is a bit too trendy for my own tastes. Prices are compatible with other dining establishments in the area.

name: Rosa Syphers
text: Out of all California Pizza establishments we frequent, this was a disappointing one. The food was poorly prepared, came to the table cold after being delivered by mistake to two different tables before finding ours. A child's B-day party …More

name: Joannie Anzalone
text: Best service of ANY CPK anywhere in the country. JAMES PATTERSON IS THE BEST GM in the WORLD Jaxk waited on us tonight. Amy is taking over while James is in California.  Juan made my Christmas Pizza.  Everything was perfect.  Arlington Heights CPK rules!!!

name: Vijaya Saradhi P
text: Always loved this place until they dropped tiramisu from their menu. Hence 4 stars. Food is always awesome, service is great. Parking is a little hassle here, which is worse in winter. I really wish they bring back the tiramisu to their menu

name: Brian Clay
text: The food was great, but the portions were too small. It's also quite expensive.

name: Wojciech Tarchala
text: Good food. Ok service.

name: Ebony Walker
text: The staff was fabulous, the manager on duty Anna is wondwrful beyond words. I will be back.

name: Aaron Freed
text: The food was amazing! The oven was huge and very entertaining to watch. The staff was knowledgable and the menu was more than adequate. The waitress was friendly and the Pineapple Colada sent me into a post-orgasmic stupor and I left a veru happy customer.

name: Diego Garber
text: I like this place. It has outdoor seating and good food

name: Dada Flooring
text: Worst service ever. Made an order online online. Got it 40 mins late! The pizza was all cold. I ordered 4 pizzas and I asked for one of them no mushrooms and for one of the other no tomato. They didnt listen. I wont be ordering again that's for sure.

name: Nancy Underwood
text: OMG the artichoke and spinach pizza was soooooo good! The waitress was wonderful, friendly and competent. The pepper, quac, and chips ...delish! Highly recommend and am looking forward to ordering for pickup and go!

name: Shelby Vandever
text: Pizza was meh. Price is a bit high for what you get. Lemonade was great though.

name: Melissa Finn
text: Stood at the door for 5 minutes, with no acknowledgement. Paid $16 for a salad. I wouldn't have stayed, had I not needed to be somewhere.

name: Nanette Scoville
text: Good food and a nice outdoor seating area.

name: Daragh F
text: Always take good care of us and our allergies.

name: Tarun Patel
text: Good food 👌✌️

name: maridel menguito Anama
text: They didn't have the featured menu item and it was six pm. Went for fund raiser.

name: Jessica Scales
text: Great pizza & service

name: Cade Walker
text: The service was terrible. The waiters had to count our table for how much food to feed us about five times, and I am not exaggerating about this. The pizza was thin,and we received the pizza 30 minutes after the others were served.

name: Ajay Madkaiker
text: Southwest pizza for the next few days

name: Steven Sovak
text: So yummm

name: phil f
text: Good

name: Matt Thomas
text: Kinda pricey

name: valbona c
text: Amazing !

name: Ab montoya
text: Place ok .

name: Donald Karpick
text: Great food and close to home!

name: Daniel Niewierowski
text: Really good
